entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 37 with temperature rising to minus 32 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of light snow beginning after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 37 with temperature rising to minus 32 by morning. Wind chill minus 48 this evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 28.
